title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. IV, subch. E, pt. 453 - Measurement Of Noise Emission; Stationary Test
content:

State Regulations
§ 453.1 - Scope of the rules in this part
§ 453.2 - Site characteristics; stationary test
§ 453.3 - Ambient conditions; stationary test
§ 453.4 - Location and operation of sound level measurement system; stationary test
§ 453.5 - Measurement procedure; stationary test

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. IV, subch. E, pt. 453

Statutory authority: Environmental Conservation Law, §§3-0301, 19-0301, 19-0303; Vehicle and Traffic Law, §386 as

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
